column1: Baby Barnaby's////We ordered a waffle with bananas and pecans
column4: and a big bowl of fresh fruit.  Our stay in Houston was 5.5 days
column5: and at the end of it
column6: Wifey was alarmed at the lack of fresh fruits and vegetables available on restaurant menus here.  So to get fresh fruit
column8: non-greasy fried potatoes on the side
column9: AND bottomless fresh squeezed OJ? Homegirl was soooo relieved.  Service was friendly and attentive.  The atmosphere is chill and laid back.
